data.title: Chris Hemsworth shows off epic salsa dance skills during wife Elsa Pataky's birthday party
data.meta_description: Chris Hemsworth showed off enthusiasm and goofiness giving his wife a birthday dance lesson.  In terms of actual skills, that will need a little work.
data.text:
Chris Hemsworth is working the demigod dance skills, as his hilarious salsa lesson birthday present to wife Elsa Pataky demonstrates.

The Thor star gave Pataky, who turned 42 Wednesday, a wild demonstration lacking in any skill. But he more than made up for it with goofy heart, posting the scene on Instagram.

"Gave my wife a dance lesson for her birthday, I should've given myself one too," Hemsworth wrote in the caption of the blooper-esque video. "Happy Birthday love."

Undaunted, he added the hashtags #danceismylfe #salsa4life.

Hemsworth has also gone viral showing off his poor dancing skills to Miley Cyrus' "Wrecking Ball" with the couple's children â€” an effort so bad it led to his own dog attacking him.

More: Chris Hemsworth goes into '12 Strong' battle pondering Thor's future

Whatever, the salsa skills worked on Pataky, the actress originally from Madrid, Spain. She posted a selfie on her own Instagram with Hemsworth goofy-slobbering over her.

"Best birthday ever, with all the people I love, especially this one, always making me laugh," she wrote.

Then she posted another video of the two pulling wine from a barrel, switching glasses mid-stream to perfection.

"Great team, not a drop spilled," she wrote. "Got your back baby!!"
